title: Assault
text: Whoever commits assault shall be punished...
punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 months, fine, or both.
procedure: File a first information report (FIR) at the local police station; seek medical certificate and preserve evidence. Attend local magistrate for complaint guidance.

title: Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property
text: Whoever cheats and dishonestly induces delivery of property shall be punished...
punishment: Imprisonment which may extend to 7 years and also fine.
examples: I paid on a website but didn't receive goods
Online seller took money and disappeared
procedure: Collect transaction records, order confirmations, bank statements, and correspondence; file an FIR for cheating; contact your bank to dispute the payment if possible.

title: Punishment for criminal breach of trust
text: Whoever commits criminal breach of trust shall be punished...
punishment: Imprisonment which may extend to 3 years, or with fine, or with both.
examples: An agent misappropriated funds entrusted to him
procedure: Gather evidence of entrustment and misuse; issue formal notices, keep copies of agreements, and file FIR if necessary; consider civil suit for recovery.
